page.title: 18OUR SPARE TIME - CONTINUED
page.content: Melissa tells us what she enjoys doing in her spare time. "My dad, my sister and me go bowling every Sunday morning at ten o'clock. We play on a bowling green which is a very flat piece of short grass. You have a small heavy bowl called a Jack and three bigger bowls which are much heavier than the Jack. You pick up the Jack and roll it along the green. Then you pick up one of the larger bowls. There is a small round disc on the bowl and if you put your little finger on the disc you shout 'finger', or if you put your thumb on the disc you shout 'thumb'. You have to try to get the bowl near to the Jack. Then your partner rolls his bowls and tries to get near to the Jack. The nearest bowl to the Jack wins and that person gets 1 point. The winner is the lst person to get twenty points.
